original_text: And they dreamed a dream both of them, each man his dream in one night, each man according to the interpretation of his dream, the butler and the baker of the king of Egypt, which were bound in the prison.
korean_text: 옥에 갇힌 애굽 왕의 술 맡은 자와 떡 굽는 자 두 사람이 하룻밤에 꿈을 꾸니 각기 그 내용이 다르더라

sentences.original_text: And they dreamed a dream both of them
each man his dream in one night
sentences.korean_translation: 각자 한 밤에 자기 꿈을 꾸었으며

sentences.original_text: each man according to the interpretation of his dream
the butler and the baker of the king of Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 애굽 왕의 술 맡은 자와 떡 맡은 자가

sentences.original_text: which were bound in the prison
